content: aside from this community are there any places where I can talk about formal verification?
formal verification of both math and computer programs
Coq and Isabelle have communities (Coq certainly has a Zulip, for example). People talk about computer programs on the Xena discord, which I tolerate.
There are zulip servers for agda and HoTT as well.
Coq zulip chat is coq.zulipchat.com , Xena discord I can give you an invite if you don't have one already.
Yeah please DM me with an invite, I somehow lost track of the server LOL
